t: Kling - High End Used Furniture
s: John A. King founded Kling Factories in 1911 after emigrating from Sweden. He purchased a bankrupt bed and lounge company in Mayville, New York and renamed it the Chautauqua Cabinet Company. For the next 50 years it would run as a family-owned furniture making company.
